account-recovery.import-wallet.descripti: Complete the form to restore your account.
account-recovery.seed-check.description: Enter your recovery phrase to change your password and/or to recover an account you've lost access to.
account-recovery.seed-check.help: Need help? Visit Customer Care
account-recovery.seed-check.title: Account recovery
account-recovery.seed-error: Some of the words you have entered are incorrect. Please review the words and try again.
account-recovery.sign-up.description: Your wallet will be imported to a new Neufund account.
account-recovery.success.text: A new unique login link has been emailed to you. Please check your inbox and save the link for future logins.
account-recovery.success.title: Success! Your account was restored.
account-setup.backup-seed-widget.text:
You will need to use the recovery phrase if you lose your unique login link and/or forget your password.
In this step you can also view your private key.
account-setup.kyc-widget-text: You may now verify your identity by clicking the link below. This step will help us get to know you, and will enable a legally safe and sound investment process. Once your identity has been successfully verified, you’ll be able to begin investing.
account-setup.pending-kyc.text.business: Thank you for submitting your identity verification request! We will review it within 7–14 business days and contact you if we require further information. Otherwise, we will notify you by email once your account has been successfully verified. To contact Customer Care, please click here.
account-setup.pending-kyc.text.individua: Thank you for submitting your identity verification request! We will review it within 2–3 business days and contact you if we require further information. Otherwise, we will notify you by email once your account has been successfully verified. To contact Customer Care, please click here.
account-setup.pending-kyc.title: Account verification
account-setup.set-email-widget.text: Please provide and verify your email address. We will not share your email address with anyone, and will only email you regarding important updates.
account-setup.verify-email-widget.text: Please check your inbox to verify your email address (sometimes it lands in your spam folder). This verification was sent to:
bank-transfer-flow.failed-to-start: We are unable to initiate bank transfer. Please contact with support.
bank-transfer.purchase.success.text: Thank you for your wire transfer, the nEUR purchase takes around 1 to 3 business days. For your convenience we will sent you an email once your request was processed and your account will be credited.
bank-transfer.purchase.summary.descripti: Please complete a wire transfer using the bank details below, and ensure you include the reference number and your name. We recommend sending funds in EUR to avoid additional bank fees.
bank-transfer.purchase.summary.note: Please note that the nEUR purchase takes around 1 - 3 business days.
bank-transfer.purchase.summary.title: PURCHASE neur
bank-transfer.redeem.init.description: To return your nEUR tokens we will use your verified bank account. The nEUR tokens will be returned to Quintessence PLC and you will receive EUR.
bank-transfer.redeem.init.errors.value-h: The amount exceeds your wallet balance
bank-transfer.redeem.init.errors.value-l: Redeem amount should be {minAmount} EUR or more
bank-transfer.redeem.init.note: It may take between 4-6 business days to complete the transaction. Your bank may charge you additional fees for incoming transfers.
bank-transfer.redeem.init.redeem-fee.too: When you redeem nEUR, a {fee}% transaction fee is charged by our banking partner. This fee will be deducted from the amount you've requested to redeem.
bank-transfer.redeem.init.title: REDEEM NEUR
bank-transfer.redeem.success.explanation: Your transaction has been confirmed by the Ethereum network and your funds are on the way to your bank account within 4 to 6 business days.
bank-transfer.redeem.summary.note: It may take between 4-6 business days to complete the transaction. Your bank may charge you additional fees for incoming transfers.
bank-transfer.redeem.summary.title: REDEEM NEUR summary
bank-transfer.redeem.title: REDEEM NEUR
bank-transfer.verify.summary.description: Please complete a wire transfer using the bank details below, and ensure you include the reference number and your name. We recommend sending funds in EUR to avoid additional bank fees.
bank-transfer.verify.summary.note: Please note that the nEUR purchase takes around 1 - 3 business days.
bank-transfer.verify.summary.title: Link your bank account via bank transfer
bank-verification.agreement.neur-purchas: I agree to the terms of the nEUR Purchase Agreement
bank-verification.agreement.note: NOTE: nEUR tokens may only be used on Neufund platform and only to acquire equity tokens or payout of proceeds by the investments on the platform. nEUR tokens cannot be exchanged between holders.
bank-verification.agreement.terms-and-co: I agree with the Terms and Conditions
bank-verification.agreement.text: Neufund has partnered with Quintessence PLC for the issuance of the nEUR token. Quintessence PLC operates a blockchain-based technology that provides for the purchase of nEUR tokens for a specific amount of EUR. To purchase nEUR tokens you agree to the terms of the nEUR Purchase Agreement.
bank-verification.agreement.title: nEUR token Partner
bank-verification.info.text: To link your bank account, please complete wire transfer with a minimum of {min} from a bank account that matches your verified identity. Once we’ve received the transfer, your bank account will be linked to your profile and used for future redeem requests. You will also receive the equivalent amount of nEUR in your wallet.
bank-verification.info.title: Link your bank account
bank-verification.success.text: Thank you for your wire transfer, the bank account verification takes around 1 to 3 business days. For your convenience we have sent you an email once your request was processed and your account verifed.
check-your-icbm-wallet-widget.notice: This tool is solely for those who committed funds during the ICBM using an unsupported wallet. Please enter your ICBM wallet address in the field below to begin the migration process.
checkUnverifiedEmailModal.browser-ledger: A welcome email containing email verification link has been sent to {unverifiedEmail}. Please verify your email address to continue with the account setup.
checkUnverifiedEmailModal.light-wallet: We've sent a welcome email containing a access link to {unverifiedEmail} that you will use to access your wallet in the future. To continue with the account setup, please go to your inbox to confirm you received the link.
checkUnverifiedEmailModal.title: Please check your inbox
common.error: Something went wrong.{separator}Please reload the page.
Private Key is saved in your clipboard
This your wallet's private key. Do not share this information with anyone. Your key is displayed here so that you may connect your Light Wallet to external browser wallet interfaces (e.g., MetaMask).
critical-error.heading: Oops… it looks like something is broken!
critical-error.paragraph: Our engineers have been notified and we are working to fix this as soon as possible. In the meantime, please try refreshing your browser.
dashboard.could-not-load-etos: Could not load ETO's list. Please try again later.
dashboard.eto-opportunities.description: Below, you’ll find all available investment opportunities on the platform. Here, you can check on the status and view important information about each offering. Click anywhere within the box and you’ll be redirected to its listing page for more details.
dashboard.incoming-payout-widget.wallet-: To participate in payout from NEU, make sure you store all NEU tokens on the wallet associated with your Neufund account.
dashboard.my-neu-widget.available-payout: You have a payout from NEU equivalent to {amount} waiting for you.
dashboard.my-neu-widget.pending-payout: There is an upcoming payout from NEU totaling {amount} {separator}in {time}.
dashboard.my-portfolio-widget.explanatio: From the dashboard, you can check your wallet balances and view available investment opportunities.
dashboard.my-wallet.title: My Wallet
dashboard.name: Dashboard
dashboard.portfolio-stats.no-assets: You have no assets in your portfolio yet.
dashboard.portfolio-stats.title: Portfolio
documents.agreement-and-prospectus-templ: Download these editable document templates to create all the legal documents required for your ETO campaign.
documents.approved-prospectus-and-agreem: Upload section for your approved or signed documents
documents.legal-documents.description: In this section, you can manage all your legal agreements and documents for your ETO. In the first section, we generate for you agreements based on the date you enter into the ETO forms. You can download them as word files, review, adjust and upload signed versions in the second section below. The second section navigates you through the order of documents that need to be uploaded.
documents.nominee-legal-documents.descri: Legal documents for your linked fundraising campaign.
documents.please-fill-the-eto-forms-in-o: Please fill the ETO forms in order to generate templates
documents.upload.file-rejected: File type not supported. Please upload a PDF.
documents.upload.terms-changed: Your ETO terms have changed. Upload a new document.
download-agreement-widget.sign-again-tex: You re-uploaded investment agreement. Now you need to announce and confirm it on Ethereum again.
download-agreement-widget.sign-on-ethere: Now when you uploaded your signed Investment Agreement, it's time to announce and confirm your signature on Ethereum. Only then Nominee will be notified and able to verify and provide his/her own signature.
This is the final step! Announced agreements can only be confirmed by the nominee. Click below to sign the agreement on Ethereum.
download-agreement-widget.signing-text: The investment summary has been updated - please download it and update your Investment and Shareholder Agreement with the current information. Once completed, please upload your signed ISHA and you will be able to access the collected funds.
download-agreement-widget.success-text: Your ETO completed successfully. You may now withdraw the funds you have collected. To do so go to your wallet.
download-agreement-widget.wait-for-nomin: Waiting for Nominee to confirm your signature
Nominee was informed that you signed Investment Agreement on-chain. Nominee will review signed document, verify its content and signatures and then confirm on-chain. Please wait...
error-boundary.widget-error-message: There was an error while loading this widget

You need to approve access to your wallet in order to use our platform
error-message.browser-wallet.wallet-conn: Please connect your wallet to the "Main Ethereum Network" by selecting from the "Networks" drop-down menu in MetaMask.
error-message.browser-wallet.wallet-lock: Your wallet seems to be locked — we can't access any accounts
error-message.browser-wallet.wallet-not-: Please check if the MetaMask extension is enabled in your browser and refresh the page. We were unable to detect any wallet.
error-message.eth-address-validation.ill: characters after "0x" can only include letters a—f, A—F and numbers
error-message.eth-address-validation.inv: A valid ETH address can only begin with a "0x"
error-message.eth-address-validation.max: A valid ETH address can only have 40 characters after "0x"
error-message.eth-address-validation.not: this is not a valid ETH address
error-message.gnosis-wallet.wallet-not-e: Please check if the Gnosis (NeuFund) extension is enabled in your browser and this website is added to whitelist. We were unable to detect the wallet.
error-message.ledger.contract-disabled: Please enable Contract Support on your Ledger
error-message.ledger.generic-error: Ledger Nano S is not available
error-message.ledger.invalid-derivation-: Please search using a supported derivation path prefix such as 44'/60'/x'/n or BIP 44
error-message.ledger.ledger-locked: Please unlock your Ledger Nano S by entering your PIN code on the device.
error-message.ledger.ledger-not-supporte: Your Ledger Nano firmware is unsupported
error-message.light-wallet.deserialize: There was a problem with Vault retrieval
error-message.light-wallet.encryption-er: There was a problem with Light Wallet encryption
error-message.light-wallet.wrong-mnemoni: Something went wrong. Please enter your 24 word recovery and try again.
error-message.light-wallet.wrong-passwor: The password you entered is incorrect. Try again.
error-message.mismatched-wallet-address: Plugged wallet address is: {actualAddress}, expected wallet address is: {desiredAddress}

eto-dashboard.company-informations: Fill in information about your company
eto-dashboard.eto-contracts-suspended: Your ETO was suspended by Platform Operator and delisted. Contact support for more details on how to re-activate your campaign.
eto-dashboard.fill-information-about-eto: Please configure your investment offer. To do so fill out all forms under ETO settings. After that you will be asked to upload a signed term sheet. This will allow you to publish your investment offer on the listing page.
eto-dashboard.link-nominee.description: In order to proceed with your ETO configuration please first connect your ETO with a nominee. To do so please give your ETH address displayed below to the Nominee. The Nominee will send you a request to accept the connection. To register your nominee ask your account manager for the secret registration link.
eto-dashboard.link-nominee.nominee-avail: Please go to {form} form and accept your Nominee.
eto-dashboard.listing-review.description: Your listing page is being published as we speak. Someone from our team will coordinate with you the publishing time of your listing page. Once your listing page is live you will be able to refer investors to it.
eto-dashboard.review.description: Your investment offer is being published as we speak. Someone from our team will coordinate with you the exact publishing time. Once your investment offer is live you will be able to refer investors to it and enable whitelisting.
eto-dashboard.setup-start-date: Agree To Terms Of Your Eto And Set The Date
eto-dashboard.sign-your-isha: Sign Your Investment And Shareholder Agreement
eto-dashboard.tooltip.description:
This is your dashboard which will guide you through the process of setting up your ETO. Below you see the so-called ETO forms which categorize all the necessary information for a beautiful, transparent and fully regulated fundraising.

All the information provided in these forms will be visible on your companies listing page. Preview this page before publishing it by navigating to “ETO Page” using the main menu.

You don’t have to fill out your profile in one go. You can save the process and return later to make additions or edits. After submitting your listing page for publishing you will still be able to update all marketing information and assets.
eto-dashboard.upload-isha: Upload your Investment and Shareholder Agreement
eto-dashboard.upload-signed-termsheet.de: You can now upload a signed term sheet. This will allow you to publish your investment offer.
eto-dashboard.waiting-for-nominee-docume: Your Nominee Is Currently Signing Eto Agreements

Your ETO smart contracts are deployed on-chain now. We have notified your Nominee to sign the legal agreements on-chain. Once all agreements you will be able to review all ETO terms, sign legal agreements from your side and set the date and time for the ETO.
eto-dashboard.waiting-for-smart-contract: Your ETO smart contracts are being deployed
Everything is set. We are currently deploying your ETO smart contracts. Once they are deployed we will notify you and you will be able proceed with the ETO setup.
eto-nominee.active-eto.set-error: There was an error while loading ETO details
eto-nominee.permissions.accept-nominee-r: Please use your wallet to confirm that you accept the nominee request.
eto-nominee.permissions.delete-nominee-r: Please use your wallet to confirm nominee rejection.
eto-overview.campaigning.whitelist-statu:
The whitelist is available to a limited number of investors on a first come first serve basis. Whitelist participation grants investors access to the typically more favorable investment terms of the presale.

Please note that the whitelist is merely for informational purposes. It does not create any legally binding obligation for you. Accordingly, you are not bound to your whitelist commitment and may change your commitment at any time. However, if your whitelist commitment is at any point changed to 0, you will be removed from the whitelist and unable to access the investment terms of the presale.
eto-overview.cover-banner.go-to-investor: This listing page might differ from what your investors see. {viewAsInvestor}
eto-overview.cover-banner.jurisdiction.d: To be publicly offered in Germany.
eto-overview.cover-banner.jurisdiction.l: To be publicly offered in Liechtenstein.
eto.document-confidentiality-agreement-m: By accessing this confidential document, the Neufund platform qualified investor, having full understanding of the consequences, undertakes an obligation to the Company and to each of the current shareholders of {companyName}, that it shall not use any of the information contained in this document for any purpose other than evaluation of its/his/her investment in offered by this offering. The liability of such qualified investor to each of the named parties to {documentTitle} for breach of the confidentiality provisions shall to the maximum extent permitted by law.

eto.form.company-information.company-cat: Add up to {limit, plural, one {# tag} other {# tags}} that best describe your company. The first two will appear on your ETO preview card and all tags will be displayed on your ETO detail page.

eto.form.eto-media.campaigning-links-des: Add links to a business plan, financial statements, one pagers, press releases, press kits etc. Please add public links to Google Drive/Dropbox/Website. These links will be displayed on the listing page.
eto.form.eto-media.enable-twitter-feed: By selecting this field your Twitter feed will be disabled on the listing page.
eto.form.eto-media.media-links-descripti: Link to mentions in the media and press releases, these will be displayed publicly

eto.form.eto-nominee.select-nominee-text: Before you can select a nominee for your fundraising campaign, you need to share your account address with them and ask them to link their Neufund account to yours. Learn more
eto.form.eto-nominee.text: This Nominee is the SPV you have set up to represent all your Token Holders after the ETO. The Nominee will be your new shareholder and the only new entry in the cap table.

Please note that both minimum voting durations for shareholders will automatically be the maximum durations for token holders.
By default, the Nominee votes “yes” to all shareholder proposals on behalf of token holders unless token holder voting majority opposes. The only exception is the tag along right.

icbm-wallet.tooltip: The Initial Capital Building Mechanism (ICBM) was a one-time event that took place from 17 November — 17 December 2017, where investors were rewarded with NEU in exchange for putting aside ETH and committing to invest it in ETOs on Neufund.
identity.modal.description:
Your Identity is now stored on the blockchain.

Once you have been successfully verified, a claim indicating such is stored directly on the blockchain. This serves two important purposes: the claim is stored securely and is immutable, while your identity remain unexposed.
investment-agreement.title: Investment Agreement
investment-flow.calculate-investment: How much would you like to invest?
investment-flow.error-message.above-maxi: The amount is above the maximum ticket size of {maxEurAmount}

investment-flow.message.no-icbm-neu-rewa: If you are using your ICBM wallet to invest, you won’t receive additional NEU for this investment.

investment-flow.success.congratulation-t: Congratulations! Your investment transaction has been confirmed. You can view your transaction on {etherscan}. We will notify you when you can claim your Equity Tokens.
investment-flow.success.title: Success! Your Investment is confirmed
investment-flow.title: Investment
investment-flow.token-price-info.general: You'll invest at a token price of {discountTokenPrice} which includes a {discountTokenPricePercentage} discount.
investment-flow.token-price-info.no-disc: You'll invest at a token price of {tokenPriceEur}.
investment-flow.token-price-info.persona: Up to {whitelistDiscountAmountLeft}, you'll invest at a token price of {whitelistDiscount} which includes a {whitelistDiscountPercentage} discount.
Above that amount you'll invest at a token price of {discountTokenPrice} which includes a {discountTokenPricePercentage} discount.
Above that amount you'll invest at a token price of {tokenPriceEur}.
investment-flow.you-already-invested: You already invested in this ETO. The current investment will be added to your previous one.
investor-payout.accept.name: Payout Accept
investor-payout.accept.success.text: Success! Your transaction is completed. Your wallet balance has been updated with this accepted payout.
Please find below a summary of the payout you will receive as a NEU token holder. Once you accept this payout, it will automatically become available in your wallet balance. You will be free to use it for further investments or  withdraw it. For reference we have attached your NEU token holder agreement.
investor-payout.accept.summary.single.de: Please find below a summary of the {token} payout you will receive as a NEU Token Holder. Once you accept this payout, it will automatically become available in your {token} wallet balance. You will be free to use it for further investments or redeem it outside the Platform. For reference we have attached your NEU Token Holder agreement.
investor-payout.accept.summary.title: ACCEPT payout from NEU

kyc.personal.politically-exposed.tooltip:
Politically Exposed Person means a natural person who is or who has been entrusted with prominent public functions and includes the following:

  • heads of State, heads of government, ministers and deputy or assistant ministers
  • members of parliament or of similar legislative bodies
  • members of the governing bodies of political parties

settings.modal.accept-tos.title: Please read our Terms of Use
Below you will find the transaction data that you will need to migrate your ICBM commitment to your verified wallet. Note: You will be conducting two separate transactions during this process.

IMPORTANT:
- The migration process is intended solely for Neufund ICBM investors who wish to migrate their ICBM commitment to a verified wallet that they will use to invest in ETOs.
- During the migration process, do not close this screen. We will monitor the pending transaction and prompt you to the next step once the transaction has been confirmed.

Need help? Check out this guide to walk you through every step of the process.

For users who are migrating from MyEtherWallet:
Click the link that says ‘Open pre-loaded transaction in MyEtherWallet’ and you will be redirected to the MyEtherWallet website in a separate tab. Check that the pre-filled information is correct and execute the transaction.

Return to this page. Once the transaction has been confirmed, you will see a message at the bottom of your screen prompting you to continue to Step 2.

For all other users (e.g., Trezor, imToken):
Open your ICBM wallet interface in a separate tab or window and look for the Send/Receive function on your wallet. Copy and paste the data below into the appropriate fields. Check that the information you’ve entered is correct and execute the transaction.

Return to this page. Once the transaction has been confirmed, you will see a message at the bottom of your screen prompting you to continue to Step 2.

For users who are migrating from MyEtherWallet:
Just as in Step 1, click the link that says ‘Open pre-loaded transaction in MyEtherWallet’ and you will be redirected to the MyEtherWallet website in a separate tab. Check that the pre-filled information is correct and execute the transaction.

Return to this page. Once the transaction has been confirmed, you will see a message at the bottom of your screen indicating that the migration process has been successfully completed.

For all other users (e.g., Trezor, imToken):
Return to your ICBM wallet interface in a separate tab or window and look for the Send/Receive function on your wallet. Copy and paste the data below into the appropriate fields. Check that the information you’ve entered is correct and execute the transaction.

Return to this page. Once the transaction has been confirmed, you will see a message at the bottom of your screen indicating that the migration process has been successfully completed.

shared-component.multi-file-upload.addit:
Please ensure the document/s follow these guidelines:
  • High-quality, colour copies
  • The document is currently valid
  • Meets all the requirements outlined by our Customer Care Agent
shared-component.multi-file-upload.indiv:
Please ensure that the documents you upload are high-quality, color copies.

Please note that you are unable to remove any documents after you’ve uploaded them.
shared-component.multi-file-upload.proof: Please upload high-quality, colour copies of the following documents:

A recent utility bill or bank statement (not more than three months old) and ensure the document displays:
  • Your full name
  • Your home address
  • The date of issue
  • The name or logo of the issuer should be clearly visible

A government-issued ID, passport, or driver's license, and ensure the document shows:
  • Your full name
  • Your date of birth
  • A clear photograph
  • The date of issue
  • Expiry date (if applicable)

Please provide a high-quality, color copy of a recent utility bill or bank statement (not more than three months old) and ensure the document displays:
  • Your full name
  • Your home address
  • The date of issue
  • The name or logo of the issuer should be clearly visible
shared-component.multi-file-upload.requi:
Required documents:
  • Proof of address (utility bill, Commercial registry extract, bank statements)
  • Commercial registry extract
  • Articles of association
  • Shareholder agreement (if applicable)
Please upload additional documents that were requested by the Customer Care agent here.
If the document contains relevant information on both the front- and rear-facing sides, please ensure that you upload a clear and coloured copy of both sides of the document.
shared-component.multi-file-upload.title: Required documents
shared-component.multi-file-upload.us-ac:
Please ensure the document/s follow these guidelines:
  • High-quality, colour copies
  • The accreditation period is currently valid
shared-component.neur-wallet-balance.exp: This is your nEUR balance. You can use it to invest through Neufund or redeem to your bank account. nEUR represents a Euro equivalent and is issued by {quintessenceHref}.
shared-component.neur-wallet-balance.res: Unfortunately, nEUR {allowedStates, select, none {can't be used by US Investors} other {can only be used by US Investors living in the states of {allowedStates}}}. We will notify you via email as soon as nEUR can be purchased in State of {userState}.
shared-component.wallet-icbm.already-upg: Congratulations! You have successfully enabled your ICBM wallet, which you may now use to invest in opportunities on the platform. Below you can see your available balance. Go to your dashboard to view available investment opportunities.
shared-component.wallet-icbm.upgrade-mes: Please click the link below to enable your ICBM wallet. Once you enable your wallet, you’ll be able to use these funds to invest in opportunities on the platform.

token-transfer-flow.name: Transfer
tx-sender.tx-pending-watching.descriptio: You have submitted transaction outside of Neufund and it still remains in the Ethereum pending pool waiting to be executed and included in new block. Neufund Platform prevents submitting more transactions if you have still pending one. In most cases this leads to unexpected problems as only one transaction with the same nonce will be mined. We'll wait until transaction specified below is mined.
tx-sender.tx-pending-watching.title: EXTERNAL PENDING TRANSACTION DETECTED
tx-sender.tx-pending.description: Your transaction is being processed by the Ethereum Network. Please be patient as this may take a while. While the transaction is in process, further transactions are unable to be initiated.
tx-sender.tx-pending.title: Your {transaction} is pending
tx-sender.tx-success.title: Successful {transaction}
tx.validation-unknown-error: There was an unknown error while using the transaction wizard
unlock-funds-flow.title: Unlock
upgrade-flow.title: ICBM Upgrade
user-claim-flow.success.congrats: Congratulations! You have successfully claimed your {token} Equity Tokens, which you'll find in the 'Your Assets' section of your Portfolio
user-claim-flow.summary.explanation: When you confirm this transaction, you are taking possession of your Equity Tokens and NEU tokens. This will allow you to claim dividends and platform proceeds. You may access your finalized investment agreements below.
user-refund-flow.description: Unfortunately, the {companyName} offering you invested in did not reach the soft cap. Please continue to refund your invested funds back to the wallet you invested with.

wallet-selector.ledger.please-upgrade: Looks like you are using a Ledger Nano with outdated firmware. For security reasons we support devices with firmware and Ethereum app version {minimumVersion} and later. Please update your Ledger Nano to access Neufund.
